dict.acceptation: 合作； 协作；协助；配合；

sent.orig: They reiterate that South-South cooperation enjoys important comparative advantages and complements rather than replaces North-South cooperation.
sent.trans: 我们重申，南南合作具有重要的比较优势，是南北合作的补充而不是替代。

sent.orig: The Company has credibility, cooperation in social service attitude, welcome to inquire, to discuss cooperation opportunities.
sent.trans: 本公司已诚信，合作的态度服务于社会，欢迎各界来电咨询，洽谈合作机会。

sent.orig: Six, cooperation: joint venture, cooperation, sole proprietorship.
sent.trans: 合作方式：合资、合作、独资。

sent.orig: Multilateral cooperation in relief is a major approach in international cooperation on relief.
sent.trans: 多边救灾合作是国际救灾合作的重要方式之一。

sent.orig: In this connection, there is another side to South-South cooperation: it can promote North-South cooperation.
sent.trans: 所以，南南合作还有一个意义，可以推动南北合作。
